metadata.title: CVE-2020-28348 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 0.9.0 up to 0.12.7 client Docker file sandbox feature may be subverted when not explicitly disabled or when using a volume mount type. Fixed in 0.12.8, 0.11.7, and 0.10.8.

criterions.comment: nomad package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
